attributes.action: Stop the BBC and other media using the misaligned phrase 'World Leaders'.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The phrase is used to describe almost any event where international politicians are gathered on mass. 
Leaders are people who lead, normally by example. 
The persons who the statement refers to are politicians, who by default do not lead by example they dictate. Therefore in clear English this statement is incorrect irrespective 
of political opinion and also offensive to true leaders of people.
